title: DeviceRequest data model based on HL7 equivalent resource
description: Smart Data Models for DeviceRequest HL7/FHIR resource type

resourceType.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/'. This is a DeviceRequest resource

meta.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Meta'. The metadata about a resource. This is content in the resource that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.

implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/uri'. String of characters used to identify a name or a resource

_implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

language.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/code'. A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_language.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

text.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Narrative'. A human-readable summary of the resource conveying the essential clinical and business information for the resource.

contained.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/ResourceList'. These resources do not have an independent existence apart from the resource that contains them - they cannot be identified independently, and nor can they have their own independent transaction scope.

extension.description: Relationship. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Extension'. May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer can define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension.

items.description: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

modifierExtension.description:
Relationship. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Extension'. May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource and that modifies the understanding of the element that contains it and/or the understanding of the containing element's descendants. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions.

Modifier extensions SHALL NOT change the meaning of any elements on Resource or DomainResource (including cannot change the meaning of modifierExtension itself).

items.description: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

identifier.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Identifier'. Identifiers assigned to this order by the orderer or by the receiver.

items.description: An identifier - identifies some entity uniquely and unambiguously. Typically this is used for business identifiers.

instantiatesCanonical.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/canonical'. The URL pointing to a FHIR-defined protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this DeviceRequest.

items.description: A URI that is a reference to a canonical URL on a FHIR resource

instantiatesUri.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/uri'. The URL pointing to an externally maintained protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this DeviceRequest.

items.description: String of characters used to identify a name or a resource
Base definition for all elements in a resource.

basedOn.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. Plan/proposal/order fulfilled by this request.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

priorRequest.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. The request takes the place of the referenced completed or terminated request(s).

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

groupIdentifier.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Identifier'. An identifier - identifies some entity uniquely and unambiguously. Typically this is used for business identifiers.

status.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/code'. A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_status.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

_intent.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

priority.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/code'. A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_priority.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

codeReference.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. A reference from one resource to another.

codeCodeableConcept.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/CodeableConcept'. A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

parameter.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/DeviceRequest_Parameter'. Specific parameters for the ordered item.  For example, the prism value for lenses.

items.description: Represents a request for a patient to employ a medical device. The device may be an implantable device, or an external assistive device, such as a walker.

subject.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. A reference from one resource to another.

encounter.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. A reference from one resource to another.

occurrenceDateTime.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/'. The timing schedule for the use of the device. The Schedule data type allows many different expressions, for example. "Every 8 hours"; "Three times a day"; "1/2 an hour before breakfast for 10 days from 23-Dec 2011:"; "15 Oct 2013, 17 Oct 2013 and 1 Nov 2013".

_occurrenceDateTime.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

occurrencePeriod.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Period'. A time period defined by a start and end date and optionally time.

occurrenceTiming.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Timing'. Specifies an event that may occur multiple times. Timing schedules are used to record when things are planned, expected or requested to occur. The most common usage is in dosage instructions for medications. They are also used when planning care of various kinds, and may be used for reporting the schedule to which past regular activities were carried out.

authoredOn.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/dateTime'. A date, date-time or partial date (e.g. just year or year + month).  If hours and minutes are specified, a time zone SHALL be populated. The format is a union of the schema types gYear, gYearMonth, date and dateTime. Seconds must be provided due to schema type constraints but may be zero-filled and may be ignored.                 Dates SHALL be valid dates.

_authoredOn.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

requester.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. A reference from one resource to another.

performerType.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/CodeableConcept'. A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

performer.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. A reference from one resource to another.

reasonCode.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/CodeableConcept'. Reason or justification for the use of this device.

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

reasonReference.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. Reason or justification for the use of this device.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

insurance.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. Insurance plans, coverage extensions, pre-authorizations and/or pre-determinations that may be required for delivering the requested service.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

supportingInfo.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. Additional clinical information about the patient that may influence the request fulfilment.  For example, this may include where on the subject's body the device will be used (i.e. the target site).

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

note.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Annotation'. Details about this request that were not represented at all or sufficiently in one of the attributes provided in a class. These may include for example a comment, an instruction, or a note associated with the statement.

items.description: A  text note which also  contains information about who made the statement and when.

relevantHistory.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. Key events in the history of the request.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be 'DeviceRequest'
